business.headline: Claiming HRA but not paying TDS? Beware of tax notices and penaltiesThe landlord's PAN must be mentioned in the TDS challan. However, if the PAN is missing or inactive, the TDS is levied at 20% under Section 206AA. On the other hand, for Non-Resident Indian (NRI) landlords, the rate of TDS is 30%.

IPO market off to a slow start in FY26, but these 4 firms to debut soonThe IPO pipeline for FY26 could be worth nearly Rs 2 lakh crore. Some major companies, including Zepto, Reliance Jio, and LG Electronics, are reportedly in the process of finalising their listing plans.

Haldiram's to sell stake to Singapore's Temasek, says PwCThis stake sale is expected to help Haldiram expand both in India and internationally, strengthening its position in the highly competitive snacks and packaged foods market.

ATM withdrawals to cost Rs 23 from May 1 as RBI hikes fee. Check detailsATM cash withdrawal will see an increase from the current charge of Rs 21 per transaction. Despite the fee hike, customers will continue to receive a limited number of free ATM transactions every month.

Is stock market closed today for Eid?The stock market follows a five-day workweek, operating from Monday to Friday. Regular trading hours are from 9:15 am to 3:30 pm. Markets remain closed on weekends and designated public holidays as per the official schedule.

IndiGo gets Rs 944 crore tax penalty, calls it erroneous and frivolousBudget carrier IndiGo's parent company said it had received a Rs 944 crore tax penalty order from the Income Tax Department. The company plans to challenge the order legally and called it "frivolous and erroneous".

Sensex, Nifty closing: Top stocks that gained and lost on BSE, NSEIT and auto sector stocks dragged the market down. The fall in IT and auto stocks is linked to concerns over US reciprocal tariffs, which are set to come into effect on April 2.

Thailand stock exchange halts trading after earthquake hits MyanmarFollowing tremors from the Myanmar earthquake, the Stock Exchange of Thailand suspended all trading for the Friday afternoon session.

DA hiked by 2%: Here's how much central government employees will earn nowWith the 2% hike, DA has now risen from 53% to 55%. Pensioners will also experience a similar increase in their Dearness Relief (DR).

Sensex, Nifty end FY25 on a weak note as Trump tariffs weigh on Dalal StreetThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 191.51 points to close at 77,414.92, while the NSE Nifty50 was down 72.60 points to end at 23,519.35.

How India saw a billionaire boom in just 10 yearsIndia's billionaire club isn't just growing—it's thriving. A decade ago, cracking this list was a rare feat. Now, it's happening faster than ever. Even with market swings and economic headwinds, the country keeps adding new names to its billionaire ranks.

Salary boost for central government employees, DA hiked by 2%With this revision, DA will rise from 53% to 55%, offering a salary boost to employees. The last DA increase took place in July 2024, when it was raised from 50% to 53%.

entertainment.headline: Kartik Aaryan gets mobbed in Gangtok while shooting for Anurag Basu's film. WatchKartik Aaryan has been shooting for Anurag Basu's romantic drama with Sreeleela in Northeast India. A video has surfaced online in which he is seen being surrounded by a huge crowd.

Richa Chadha slams top filmmakers stereotyping actors: We can learn from SouthRicha Chadha has openly criticised the film industry's tendency to typecast actors, urging a shift towards more inclusive casting. She highlighted the South Indian film industry as a model for diverse role opportunities.

Kapil Sharma's first look from Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon 2 unveiled on EidKapil Sharma's first look from Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon 2 was revealed on Eid. Directed by Anukalp Goswami, the comedy sequel also stars Manjot Singh and is produced by Abbas-Mustan.
Shangri-La Frontier season 3 announced with key visual art. Seen yet?Season 3 of the popular anime Shangri-La Frontier was announced on Sunday, the very day when the second season came to an end.

Kareena honours backstage heroes, recalls pregnancy ramp-walkActor Kareena Kapoor Khan closed the grand finale of the Lakme Fashion Week on Sunday with a heart-warming shout-out to the people working backstage. She also recalled the time when she walked the runway during pregnancy.

Gautami Kapoor claps back at Ekta's indirect dig at husband Ram's weight lossActor and Ram Kapoor's wife Gautami Kapoor mimicked Ekta Kapoor's video amid the ongoing feud between Ekta and Ram. The conflict started over Ram's claims about Bade Achhe Lagte Hain and intensified with social media digs.

Sikandar box office Day 1: Piracy hits Salman Khan's film, opens at Rs 26 croreSikandar box office collection Day 1: Salman Khan's film had a decent opening on Sunday. However, piracy hit the film ahead of its release. Experts have suggested that the film's online leak might cause a 30-40% loss in business.

Empuraan box office Day 4: Mohanlal film earns Rs 60 crore in India amid backlashMohanlal and director Prithviraj Sukumaran's Empuraan courted controversy over the portrayal of riot scenes. Despite the row, the film has earned over Rs 60 crore nett at the domestic box office.

Mohanlal aware of every scene: Prithviraj's mother over Empuraan rowPrithviraj Sukumaran's mother and actor Mallika Sukumaran defended her son in the ongoing Empuraan row. In a long Facebook post, she claimed that Mohanlal was aware of every scene in Empuraan and that her son never deceived anyone.
Screen idol Richard Chamberlain dies at 90American actor Richard Chamberlain, known for his shows such as Shogun and Dr Kildare, has died. He was 90.

Salman Khan's Sikandar box office performance might be impacted. Here's whySuperstar Salman Khan's Sikandar's box office performance might be severely impacted in the days to come. Already, trade experts are predicting only a Rs 30 crore opening.

Sikandar box office Day 1 prediction: Salman film to open around Rs 30 crore-markSikandar box office Day 1 prediction: Superstar Salman Khan's latest release, Sikandar, is gearing up for a grand opening. According to trade reports, Sikandar might make somewhere around Rs 25-30 crore on its opening day.

Actor Vidyut Jammwal supports Kunal Kamra, asks why no one questions Kamaal R KhanActor Vidyut Jammwal has seemingly extended his support to comedian Kunal Kamra in his latest social media post. He also asked why no one ever questions actor Kamaal R Khan's statements that often target women and the country itself.

Aishwarya Rai, Abhishek Bachchan, and Aaradhya's viral pics from cousin's weddingA photo of Aishwarya Rai enjoying her cousin's wedding with her husband-actor Abhishek Bachchan and daughter Aaradhya has gone viral.

Empuraan box office Day 3: Mohanlal's film inches close to Rs 50 crore markPrithviraj Sukumaran's third directorial, L2: Empuraan, witnessed a slight rise in domestic earnings on Saturday. The film released in theatres on March 27.

PM Modi's big shoutout to rapper Hanumankind for his song Run it UpPrime Minister Narendra Modi has congratulated Indian-origin rapper Hanumankind for his latest song, Run it Up. The PM shared his congratulatory wishes to the artiste during his Mann Ki Baat address.

From regal forts to peacocks: Priyanka Chopra gets grand welcome in JaipurPriyanka Chopra reached Jaipur for her professional commitments. The actor shared a bunch of pictures from her stay on social media.

MobLand review: A gritty crime drama with a stellar castReleased-Mon Mar 31, 2025MobLand delves into the violent world of two crime families in London. With a stellar cast, this series offers gripping drama and intense power dynamics. Read on and find out if it suits your taste.

Mohanlal says Gujarat riot themes to be removed from Empuraan: Regret mental painActor Mohanlal has apologised over riot references in his film L2: Empuraan. The Malayalam star released a statement on social media on Sunday amid the ongoing row.

general news.headline: PM Modi visited RSS office to convey his retirement plans, Sanjay Raut claimsSanjay Raut has claimed that the RSS will decide Prime Minister Narendra Modi's successor, linking the latter's recent Nagpur visit to a leadership transition.
Woman Naxal with Rs 25 lakh bounty killed in Chhattisgarh encounter, gunfight onWoman Naxal carrying bounty of Rs 25 lakh killed in encounter in Chhattisgarh's Dantewada; gunfight underway

YouTuber owned Lamborghini that hit 2 in Noida, to-be buyer at wheel during crashThe police have summoned YouTuber Mridul Tiwari for questioning as they investigate who authorised the car's use at the time of the incident on Sunday evening.

Don't read history on WhatsApp: Raj Thackeray on row over Aurangzeb's tombSpeaking at his Gudi Padwa rally in Mumbai, Raj Thackeray warned against misleading narratives and WhatsApp forwards, stressing the need for credible historical sources.

The hidden dangers of India's obsession with self-medicationSelf-medication can lead to unintended side effects and even serious health risks. Indians obsessing over self-medication comes from various aspects, including financial constraints, cultural beliefs, and a general distrust of the medical system.

Iran readies missiles to retaliate after Trump's threat over nuclear deal: ReportFollowing Donald Trump's threat, Iran has placed its missiles in ready-to-launch mode within underground facilities across the country, designed to withstand airstrikes.

Hyderabad University tense amid protest over land takeover, 53 students detainedPolice detained several University of Hyderabad students protesting against the alleged auction of 400 acres of land. Students claimed earthmovers were clearing the area, while university authorities denied ownership of the disputed land.

Elon Musk heckled during speech, he fires back: 'Say hi to George Soros for me'When interrupted by a protester during his Town Hall address, Elon Musk said he was not surprised, claiming the disruption was caused by 'operatives' planted by his George Soros.

Video: Spectrum rocket dramatically crashes seconds after maiden launchDramatic footage captured the Spectrum rocket spiraling out of control before plummeting to the ground and exploding in a fireball.

Deepfake video of cop kissing Meerut murder accused surfaces, case filedMeerut Police has booked an Instagram user under the IT Act for circulating an AI-generated video falsely depicting a senior inspector with murder accused Muskan Rastogi, who killed her husband with the help of her boyfriend.

700 worshippers killed when quake hit during Friday prayers: Myanmar Muslim bodyA Myanmar Muslim organisation said that more than 700 worshippers were killed, and some 60 mosques were damaged in Friday's earthquake that shook the country to its core.

Mohanlal aware of every scene: Prithviraj's mother over Empuraan rowPrithviraj Sukumaran's mother and actor Mallika Sukumaran defended her son in the ongoing Empuraan row. In a long Facebook post, she claimed that Mohanlal was aware of every scene in Empuraan and that her son never deceived anyone.

CSK fan's dramatic reaction to Dhoni's dismissal is the Internet's new favourite memeDhoni managed just 16 runs before Shimron Hetmyer took a crucial catch to send him back to the pavilion, and it is the woman's reaction to this moment that has become an instant viral sensation.

IPL 2025 preview MI vs KKR: Battered Mumbai desperate to get campaign going at homeIPL 2025, Mumbai Indians vs Kolkata Knight Riders Match Preview: Mumbai will look for their maiden win of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) as they take on Kolkata in Match 12 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Clashes erupt in Bihar after stones thrown at Shobha Yatra devotees, 6 arrestedAccording to police, the unrest was triggered by a rumour that a hen was beaten with sticks in the area, which led to heightened tensions between the two communities.

Did Rajput icon Rana Sanga invite Babur? The political row that's raging in UPAmidst a BJP-Rajput community backlash and violence, the Samajwadi Party has rallied behind its Rajya Sabha MP Ramji Lal Suman whose remarks started it all

How pets are becoming the ultimate deal-breaker (or maker) in modern datingAmong the many factors that influence modern dating, such as political views, food preferences, and parenting outlook, one's fondness (or lack thereof) for pets can be a deal-maker or breaker.

Florida woman films sex acts with pet chihuahua, posts on Instagram; arrestedLogan Guminski admitted that she had received USD 500 (nearly Rs 43,000) from a social media user in exchange for more videos of her engaging in sexual acts with her pet.

Ex-Chief Minister's 'lion don't hunt dogs' remark against Dalit officer sparks rowThe Uttarakhand IAS Association has protested Haridwar MP Trivendra Singh Rawat's remark against Dalit IAS officer Brajesh Sant amid the escalating illegal mining controversy, condemning it as casteist.

Prashant Kishor backs 'friend' Kunal Kamra in joke row: No ulterior motivePrashant Kishor defended Kunal Kamra, stating the comedian has no political motives. Kamra is facing legal trouble over remarks on Eknath Shinde, prompting backlash and vandalism by Shiv Sena supporters.
Mumbai's first tree top walk at Malabar Hill opens to visitors: Check timings and entry feesVisitors can now take a peaceful walk among the treetops while enjoying stunning views of the city.

Sonia Gandhi slams National Education Policy: Government pushing '3 Cs' agendaSonia Gandhi has slammed the BJP government for imposing NEP 2020 without consultation, alleging it centralises control, promotes commercialisation, and undermines federalism.

Meerut murder accused's days in jail: Farming, sewing and a visit by Arun GovilThe duo had killed Saurabh, dismembered his body, stuffed the remains into a drum, and sealed it with cement before leaving for a vacation in Himachal Pradesh.

Did anyone die, Lamborghini driver asks on camera after ramming 2 in NoidaA man rammed his Lamborghini into two labourers in Noida Sector 94, seriously injuring them before asking locals whether somebody had died during a confrontation with them. Police detained the accused and confiscated the vehicle.

sports.headline: 3 pretty good moments: Stephen Fleming reflects on turning points in RR vs CSKStephen Fleming reflected on the main turning points in CSK's loss to RR in Guwahati on Sunday, March 30. CSK lost the match by 6 runs in Guwahati and Fleming pointed out his side's performance in the powerplay, Riyan Parag's catch of Shivam Dube and Wanindu Hasaranga's bowling performance as the main reasons for the defeat.

MI vs KKR, pitch, weather report: High-scoring game on cards in hot MumbaiMumbai Indians will welcome the Kolkata Knight Riders to the Wankhede stadium on Monday, March 31. MI are looking for their first win of the season while KKR will aim to continue their momentum.

IPL 2025 preview MI vs KKR: Battered Mumbai desperate to get campaign going at homeIPL 2025, Mumbai Indians vs Kolkata Knight Riders Match Preview: Mumbai will look for their maiden win of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) as they take on Kolkata in Match 12 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

MI vs KKR predicted XI, fantasy picks: Will Mumbai make big changes at home?Mumbai Indians are set to welcome defending champions Kolkata Knight Riders to the iconic Wankhede stadium for their first home game of the IPL 2025 campaign on Monday, March 31. MI will be looking to make some big changes while KKR are set to welcome back Sunil Narine to the lineup.

Not MS Dhoni, the top order needs to stand up for CSKMS Dhoni was criticised once again after CSK loss against Rajasthan Royals on Sunday. But should the fans really be mad at him? Should they not be more concerned about their non-performing top order that has not turned up in three back to back matches.

IPL 2025: After CSK win, RR captain Riyan Parag fined for code of conduct breachFollowing the win over Chennai Super Kings, Rajasthan Royals' stand-in skipper Riyan Parag was fined Rs. 12 lakhs for maintaining a slow over-rate during the match in Guwahati on Sunday, March 30.

Jofra Archer set up the game perfectly for us in the powerplay: Nitish RanaRajasthan Royals (RR) batter Nitish Rana praised fast bowler Jofra Archer for his match-winning spell against Chennai Super Kings (CSK) in match 11 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025). Archer registered figures of 1/13 in three overs as Rajasthan won by six runs.

IPL 2025: Nitish Rana in awe of Riyan Parag for match-turning moment against CSKNitish Rana praised Rajasthan Royals (RR) stand-in captain Riyan Parag for his match-turning catch of Shivam Dube during Match 18 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

MS Dhoni can't bat 10 overs running full stick: Stephen Fleming on CSK legendCSK coach Stephen Fleming has said that MS Dhoni can't bat for 10 overs during a match and the legendary wicketkeeper decides when he wants to come in after their loss to RR on Sunday, March 30.

Jakub Mensik stuns idol Novak Djokovic to win 1st ATP title at Miami OpenJakub Mensik beat his idol Novak Djokovic to clinch his maiden ATP title at the Miami Open. The 19-year-old beat Djokovic 7-6 (7-4), 7-6 (7-4) and became the ninth youngest to win an ATP title.

MS Dhoni still the same old match-winner? CSK legend's IPL numbers don't agree IPL 2025: MS Dhoni hasn't contributed enough to CSK's wins since the 2023 edition of the tournament. On Sunday, Dhoni's 16-run knock went in vain as the Super Kings lost to Rajasthan Royals by six runs in Guwahati.

Watch: Bumrah starts bowling at NCA, sparks return hopes for Mumbai IndiansIndia and Mumbai Indians fast bowler Jasprit Bumrah has started bowling with full intensity at the Centre of Excellence in Bengaluru. The speedster has been out of action since the fifth Test of the Border Gavaskar Trophy 2024-25.

Gaikwad to open, not Tripathi: Vaughan suggests CSK batting changeMichael Vaughan believes Chennai Super Kings must let Ruturaj Gaikwad open instead of Rahul Tripathi to revive their batting order. Tripathi was underwhelming yet  again in CSK's 6 -run defeat to Rajasthan Royals.

Under Nadal's tutelage, Maaya Rajeshwaran sets sights on ultimate ambitionIn an exclusive interview with India Today Digital, India's 15-year-old tennis sensation Maaya Rajeshwaran talked about her campaign in the Mumbai Open, where she qualified for the semi-finals and opened up on her experience of training under the eyes of Rafael Nadal at the Spanish legend's academy in Mallorca.

Points Table, March 30: MI pushed to bottom by Royals after Chennai heistIPL Points Table Update, March 30: Rajasthan Royals got off from the bottom of the table after beating the Chennai Super Kings by six runs in the second of Sunday's doubleheader at the Barsapara Cricket Stadium in Guwahati.

IPL 2025: MS Dhoni checks on injured RR coach Dravid after Guwahati thrillerDespite Chennai Super Kings' heartbreaking defeat to Rajasthan Royals, MS Dhoni's heartwarming gesture of checking on injured RR coach Rahul Dravid after the match won hearts. CSK suffered a narrow defeat in Guwahati despite Dhoni coming up to bat at number 7.

CSK not pro-active enough? Gaikwad calls for improvement after defeat vs RRIPL 2025, RR vs CSK: Ruturaj Gaikwad said that the Chennai Super Kings were not proactive enough after losing to the Rajasthan Royals on Sunday where they failed to chase down 183 at the Barsapara Stadium in Guwahati.

IPL 2025: MS Dhoni walks in at No.7, but fails to fire for CSK vs RRMS Dhoni's promotion to number 7 wasn't enough as Chennai Super Kings suffered their second consecutive defeat, falling short of the 183-run target against Rajasthan Royals despite a valiant effort from their skipper.

Nitish Rana, Hasaranga stun CSK in Guwahati as RR open account in IPL 2025IPL 2025: Rajasthan Royals clinched their first win of the season by defeating Chennai Super Kings on Sunday, March 30. Chennai failed to chase down a target of over 180 runs once again. Wanindu Hasaranga and Nitish Rana starred for RR after poor starts to their respective seasons.

IPL 2025: MS Dhoni checks on injured RR coach Dravid after Guwahati thrillerDespite Chennai Super Kings' heartbreaking defeat to Rajasthan Royals, MS Dhoni's heartwarming gesture of checking on injured RR coach Rahul Dravid after the match won hearts. CSK suffered a narrow defeat in Guwahati despite Dhoni coming up to bat at number 7.

Chennai failed to chase down a target of over 180 runs once again. Wanindu Hasaranga and Nitish Rana starred for RR after poor starts to their respective seasons.

Riyan Parag, Fraser-McGurk, Vijay Shankar grab sensational catchesIPL 2025: Riyan Parag took a brilliant catch to send Shivam Dube packing in the match between CSK and RR. Earlier in the day, Delhi Capitals' Jake Fraser-McGurk pulled off a stupendous catch as well.

20 games, 0 losses: Barcelona hammer Girona 4-1 to continue dream run in 2025FC Barcelona thrashed Girona 4-1 on Sunday to continue their dream run in 2025. Barcelona have played a total of 20 matches so far in 2025 and have not lost a single one of them.

After 699 days, Jofra Archer ends wait for IPL wicket with fiery overIPL 2025, RR vs CSK: Jofra Archer breathed fire in his first two overs when he also got the wicket of the in-form Rachin Ravindra in Rajasthan's clash against Chennai on Sunday at the Barsapara Stadium in Guwahati.

DC vs SRH: How big brother KL Rahul helped Abhishek Porel forget costly dropIPL 2025, DC vs SRH: Abhishek Porel dropped SunRisers Hyderabad's Aniket Verma on 6 in Vzag on Sunday. The debutant went on to hit 74 off 41 deliveries in their loss to Delhi Capitals.

Watch: R Ashwin and MS Dhoni recreate old magic to outfox rampaging Nitish RanaIPL 2025, RR vs CSK: MS Dhoni and R Ashwin recreated a bit of old magic to stop Nitish Rana's rampage in Guwahati. The Rajasthan Royals star missed a well-deserved hundred after he was out stumped by Dhoni on Sunday, March 30.

KKR coach responds to pitch controversy: We expect some home advantageIPL 2025: Chandrakant Pandit downplayed pitch controversy, asserting KKR's readiness to adapt to any conditions while expecting fair home advantage like other IPL teams. KKR take on Mumbai Indians on March 31, as they look to build some winning momentum.

Starc drops fast bowler's ego, runs through SRH to close perfect Vizag chapterMitchell Starc ran through the SRH batting order on Sunday, March 29. After picking his maiden 5-wicket haul in T20s, Starc said that he has had to snub his fast bowler's ego in the recent past.

IPL 2025: CSK make big changes vs RR after disastrous loss to RCBDesperate to recover from their loss to Royal Challengers Bengaluru, Chennai  Super Kings made two big changes to their playing XI against an unchanged Rajasthan Royals for their Guwahati clash on March 30.

Mitchell Starc haunts SRH once again as DC flaunt title aspirationsIPL 2025, DC vs SRH: Delhi Capitals came up with an all-round performance to hammer SunRIsers Hyderabad by 7 wickets in Vizag on Sunday, March 30. Mitchell Starc's five-wicket haul and Faf du Plessis's quick-fire 50 helped SRH win with four overs to spare, chasing 164 without breaking a sweat.

DC vs SRH: Mitchell Starc rocks Sunrisers Hyderabad with maiden T20 5-wicket haulIPL 2025, DC vs SRH: Delhi Capitals' fast bowler Mitchell Starc finished with figures of 3.4-0-35-5 against Sunrisers Hyderabad on Sunday as he recorded his best figures in T20s.

SRH threaten to leave Hyderabad over blackmail for free IPL tickets: ReportIPL 2025: SunRisers Hyderabad have reportedly threatened to move their home base from Hyderabad after alleging blackmail from Hyderabad Cricket Association over free tickets. A VIP box was locked after SRH refused to give out extra complementary passes during their home game against Lucknow Super Giants on March 27.

RR vs CSK Highlights: RR defeat CSK by 6 runs in Guwahati thrillerRajasthan Royals (RR) vs Chennai Super Kings (CSK) Highlights, IPL 2025: Chennai Super Kings suffered their second straight defeat with a 6-run loss to Rajasthan Royals, which could not have been prevented even with MS Dhoni coming in at number 7 in their 183 chase.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
